bike.description: Specialized Amira FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact women's race geometry

1 1/8 - 1 3/8" Aheadset stainless balls w/ top cap, 20mm cone spacer, 20mm flat spacers

Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible
Silver cage/black body, w/ black toe clips and strap

Specialized Mondo Pro II, 700x23c, aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Body Geometry Ruby Gel w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
